description: {"blocks":[{"key":"85di1","text":"Instructions for delivery of investigator data via the SMDNAS02 drive.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ap55q","text":"On July 1st 2024, URMC Genomics Research Center will be moving away from web delivery links and to direct delivery via SMDNAS (specifically SMDNAS02) for internal university users.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apq6c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"246th","text":"This change in delivery method is being introduced to streamline delivery of data away from links that expire, links that are otherwise accessible by anyone, to ensure long term data storage, and to ensure data storage within a legally-restricted and more secure data transfer system. It is UR security and management policy to not use hard drives for data longevity and security for any UR research generated data.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab2b7","text":"I am receiving a \"permission denied\" error when trying to connect to my drive or I would like to grant someone in my lab access to the folder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":141}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6q32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75s29","text":"Please fill out the form at https://is.gd/SMDNASRequest and they will be in touch. Generally, the steps will be as follows","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":27},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":28,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":27}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ohi5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7494t","text":"Select \"I would like to\" -\u003e \"Add/remove user access to a share\"","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72ei8","text":"\"What is the name of your current server share?\" -\u003e \"SMDNAS02\"","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"163s6","text":"\"Lab/Subfolder Folder Name:\" -\u003e Type in your folder of interest","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42cdi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6DF0BBDC1DBF11EF84A90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://is.gd/SMDNASRequest"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1tih","text":"I have space within BlueHive or BHWard, is it still possible to receive my data there?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":86}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sevl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gl8m","text":"Yes, this is the preferred method of delivery. If you are not already receiving data via BlueHive and are working within this environment, please reach out to urgenomics@urmc.rochester.edu or grcbioinform@urmc.rochester.edu and we can make sure to push data there in the future.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckpt7","text":"How will this be billed?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56p27","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu438","text":"These SMDNAS02 data shares are offered at no cost to UR researchers as part of a collaboration between CART and Research IT. Each investigator share will have 2TB of storage space initially. If additional storage space is needed, users can submit a request using this link: https://is.gd/SMDNASRequest.  Please contact Research IT for any additional questions or needs for data storage: https://www.urmc.rochester.edu/smd/it.aspx or email at smdithelp@urmc.rochester.edu","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":274,"length":27},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":274,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":274,"length":27},{"key":1,"offset":387,"length":42}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6DF0BBDC1DBF11EF84A90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://is.gd/SMDNASRequest"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A7CAC8D21DC811EF84A90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.urmc.rochester.edu/smd/it.aspx"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98f0m","text":"How can I send data to collaborators outside of the university?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n9a3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm8od","text":"The GRC can still provide delivery links to external users. Please contact us at urgenomics@urmc.rochester.edu or grcbioinform@urmc.rochester.edu.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Delivery via SMDNAS02
